= Convert [MarkUp#MarkupDocument MarkupDocuments] to REPORTS in certain formats =
BiVeS knows some classes (extending [http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-Core/de/unirostock/sems/bives/markup/Typesetting.html Typesetting]) able to convert format independent [MarkUp#MarkupDocument MarkupDocuments] into certain formats, such as [TypeSetting#HTML HTML] or [TypeSetting#MarkDown MarkDown]

== HTML ==
* source:src/main/java/de/unirostock/sems/bives/markup/TypesettingHTML.java ([http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-Core/de/unirostock/sems/bives/markup/TypesettingHTML.html JavaDoc])
* HTML report looks like: ReportHtml
* you can simply integrate it to your website
* plus some CSS rules to add some layout, see ReportHtml

== !MarkDown ==
* source:src/main/java/de/unirostock/sems/bives/markup/TypesettingMarkDown.java ([http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-Core/de/unirostock/sems/bives/markup/TypesettingMarkDown.html JavaDoc])
* learn more about [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown MarkDown]
* exported !MarkDown looks like XXX
* convertable to serveral other formats -> convenient to integrate

== Add Your Own Report Layout ==
* you need to extend source:src/main/java/de/unirostock/sems/bives/markup/Typesetting.java ([http://jdoc.sems.uni-rostock.de/BiVeS-Core/de/unirostock/sems/bives/markup/Typesetting.html JavaDoc])
* in [ markup] you'll get a [MarkUp#MarkupDocument MarkupDocument], TODO: document how to replace static stuff
* pass it to [[API#GetaReport]]
